channel.title: [delta] Make npc allow melee only [317]
channel.description:
oke i need to make some bosses to can hit melee only
because i thought i founded some spots that cant be safe spotted , but some players did it -.-
and finding other (good) spots is hard so i prefer this
how i make a npc can only get hitted by melee style
like chaos can only get hitted ranged or maged ( yes i searshed for this in npchandler cant find it ) i know this is nthing for u guys but for me it is so plz help me :D

item.title: [delta] Make npc allow melee only [317]
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:6, topic:376258”][quote author=BitchPk link=topic=472190.msg3453498#msg3453498 date=1293913565]

I guess you would add something to your AttackNPC() method:

		if(type == #### && UseBow && UseCrossBow && UseRing){
			sM("You can't range it!");
			ResetAttackNPC();
		return false;
		}

= npc ID

for magic because they can do without equipment I’m not so sure, I guess you can make them fail… splash = true;

This may work, not for maging though

i dont ned it for mage but for range
but there are 3 important errors :s
he dont reconize UseBow UseCrossBow and UseRing
[/quote]even more i think
don’t u have to use || instead of &&
now u have to have a bow and a cbow and a ring wich is impossible

correct me if i’m wrong[/quote]
nop that gives that 3 errors again here are the errors

client.java:7112: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseBow location: class client if(type == 2900 || UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){ ^ client.java:7112: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseCrossBow location: class client if(type == 2900 || UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){ ^ client.java:7112: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseRing location: class client if(type == 2900 || UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){ ^ 3 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

Read full topic
